description: Develop a secure and reliable authentication mechanism including login, signup, and password recovery.

taskName: Setup CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions
description: Create an automated build, test, and deploy pipeline to ensure smooth integration and deployment.

taskName: Enable PWA capabilities in the app

taskName: Fix scroll behavior on page refresh
